semantic_title: Outcome of Delivery Code for O80
section_path: Section I > C. Chapter-Specific Coding Guidelines > 15. Pregnancy, Childbirth, and the Puerperium > n. Normal Delivery, Code O80 > 3) Outcome of delivery for O80

content.full_text: Z37.0, Single live birth, is the only outcome of delivery code appropriate for use with O80. (Evidence: pg no: 69, L80-L82)
content.summary: Specific outcome of delivery code requirement when using O80 for uncomplicated deliveries (Evidence: pg no: 69, L80-L82)
key_concepts: Z37.0 is only appropriate outcome code with O80 (Evidence: pg no: 69, L81-L82)
Single live birth requirement (Evidence: pg no: 69, L81)
Exclusive pairing requirement (Evidence: pg no: 69, L80-L82)

detailed_rules.rule_text: Only Z37.0 should be used as outcome code with O80 (Evidence: pg no: 69, L80-L82)
detailed_rules.explanation: When using O80 for uncomplicated delivery, the only appropriate outcome of delivery code is Z37.0 for single live birth (Evidence: pg no: 69, L80-L82)

workflow_steps: Step 1: Assign O80 for uncomplicated delivery
Step 2: Add Z37.0 as outcome of delivery code
Step 3: Do not use any other Z37 codes

specific_codes.description: Single live birth (Evidence: pg no: 69, L81)
specific_codes.context: Only outcome code appropriate with O80

specific_codes.description: Encounter for full term uncomplicated delivery (Evidence: pg no: 69, L82)

coding_scenarios.documentation_example: Full-term uncomplicated vaginal delivery of healthy single infant
step_by_step: Step 1: Assign O80 for uncomplicated delivery
Step 2: Add Z37.0 for single live birth outcome

correct_coding.rationale: Z37.0 is the only appropriate outcome code with O80 (Evidence: pg no: 69, L80-L82)

incorrect_coding.rationale: Z37.1 is not appropriate with O80
incorrect_coding.common_mistake: Using wrong outcome of delivery code

warnings: Only Z37.0 is appropriate with O80 (Evidence: pg no: 69, L80-L82)
best_practices: Always pair O80 with Z37.0 (Evidence: pg no: 69, L80-L82)
common_mistakes: Using other Z37 codes with O80
tips: O80 and Z37.0 are a required pair
clinical_context: Outcome coding required for all deliveries
